Description: Small flake of dark flint, retouched at the rounded edge, cortex remaining at the other. Possibly a small scraper.
Curator's comments: One of six flint ‘flakes’ found in a cooking pot together with domestic debris including ashes, twigs, animal bones, and potsherds (see 62228-33).
Bibliographic references: Brunton 1937 / Mostagedda and the Tasian Culture (p. 16)
